name: Practical Service Product Design
description:
If you're a service professional like a lawyer or consultant, productizing your services online is a great way to both offer clients more tailored service, as well as be able to help more people through standardization.


Getting started with productizing involves looking at your process, and designing your service product around it.


In this template, you'll be able to see a simplified example of a service product process, as well as be able to create your own. Use this as a guide as you start on your own path to delivering exceptional service at scale.


Feel free to remix this template and use it for your own service business! If you publish anywhere, please credit to Jasmine Gavigan with vrtu. Hope it helps!!


Also, check out our YouTube video where we walk you through an existing service product process and give you some tips for creating one of your own.
